messages.subject: Lone kashira search...
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all - Thought I d ask if anyone out there might have a lone kashira depicting a gold dragon and shakudo clouds on a nanako ground of shakudo,
messages.messageBody:
Hi all -

Thought I'd ask if anyone out there might have a "lone" kashira depicting a gold dragon and shakudo clouds on a nanako ground of shakudo, katana-sized. Trying to match up a lone fuchi. If so, contact me privately: swords@...

Ron
STL

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
